      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void drawAll()
      set the map Then update rectangles with the new values Draw the updated rectangles
      void drawRectangles(int[][] rect) 
      void newRectangles()
      iterate over every point in the map and calculate how many live cells amongst its neighbors Then change its value following the Conway rule.
      void next()
      implementing the next method each time, reset then draw All using the drawAll method
      void restart()
      implementing the restart method each time, reset then draw the initial rectangles, then set rectangles to its initial values
      void setConway()
      put every rectangle in the map alongside with its rectangle neighbors
      void setRectangles(int[][] newR)
      copy the new values into the rectangles attribute.

      • Conways

        public Conways(Space squares,
               int largeur,
               int longeur,
               GUISimulator ig)
        Parameters:
        squares - (class of type Space that holds the initial test values)
        largeur - (width of the window)
        longeur - (height of the window)
        ig - (a GUI simulator)

    • Method Detail

      • setConway

        public void setConway()
        put every rectangle in the map alongside with its rectangle neighbors

      • newRectangles

        public void newRectangles()
        iterate over every point in the map and calculate how many live cells amongst its neighbors Then change its value following the Conway rule.

      • setRectangles

        public void setRectangles(int[][] newR)
        copy the new values into the rectangles attribute.
        Parameters:
        newR -

      • drawRectangles

        public void drawRectangles(int[][] rect)
        Parameters:
        rect - (matrix with values 0 and 1) if the value is 0, draw the rectangle in WHITE if the value is 1, draw the rectangle in BLUE the filling in each case is with LIGHT_GRAY

      • drawAll

        public void drawAll()
        set the map Then update rectangles with the new values Draw the updated rectangles

      • next

        public void next()
        implementing the next method each time, reset then draw All using the drawAll method

      • restart

        public void restart()
        implementing the restart method each time, reset then draw the initial rectangles, then set rectangles to its initial values
